title: Robust Transforming Combiners from Indistinguishability Obfuscation to Functional Encryption.
abstract: Indistinguishability Obfuscation (iO) has enabled an incredible number of new and exciting applications. However, our understanding of how to actually build secure iO remains in its infancy. While many candidate constructions have been published, some have been broken, and it is unclear which of the remaining candidates are secure.
